name: calcium chloride to generic market for de-icer | de-icer | Cutoff, U

ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19005/documentation

This activity links calcium chloride to the generic market for de-icer. All chemicals that enter that market provide the function of a de-icer.
